snippet: The field for the 138th running of the Preakness Stakes is starting to take shape. Eight Kentucky Derby starters are being considered for the middle jewel of the Triple Crown, and they will be joined by three or four horses who did not race in the...
abstract: The field for the 138th running of the Preakness Stakes is starting to take shape. Eight Kentucky Derby starters are being considered for the middle jewel of the Triple Crown, and they will be joined by three or four horses who did not race in the Derby.

headline.main: Orb Stays Loose in Mud as Preakness Field Comes Together
